description: Try our easy to follow Turducken & Roast Potatoes recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Roast turkey,Roast,Seafood free,Soy free,Egg free,Turkey,Sesame free,Potato,Peanut free
name: Turducken & Roast Potatoes Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 170Â°C. Remove film from turducken tray. Spray meat with a little oil. Cover with foil. Bake for 1 hour. Remove foil. Cook for a further 30 minutes.
Meanwhile, cook the potatoes in a saucepan of boiling, salted water for 20 to 25 minutes or until just tender. Drain and cool slightly.
Combine oil and butter in a baking dish. Heat in oven for 3 to 5 minutes. Add potatoes and turn to coat. Season with salt. Bake, turning occasionally, for 35 to 40 minutes.
Rest meat for 10 minutes before slicing. Serve with roast potatoes.
